ORG_0000093 - ror active status

Label

ror active status

Editor preferred label

active

Sub class of

BFO_0000019 - quality

Definition

The disposition of an organization to be in current existence and currently operational

Definition source

https://ror.org

Example

Microsoft is active

Term editor

Michael Conlon https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1304-8447
